mapper.select: SELECT novel_id AS novelId, title, created_at AS creationDate FROM novel_detail ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT n.novel_id AS novelId, n.title, n.genre, n.status, n.creation_id, n.intro, n.created_at AS createdAt, i.image_url AS imageUrl FROM novel n LEFT JOIN image_generation_data i ON n.creation_id = i.creation_id WHERE n.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
SELECT novel_id AS novelId, title, created_at AS creationDate FROM novel WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY created_at DESC
